properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 12:22PM CST until January 14 at 3:36AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Tombigbee River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Tombigbee River at Bigbee
* from Saturday January 11 until Monday January 13.
* At 11 AM Friday the stage was 8.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 18.2 feet on Sunday January 12.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Saturday January 11 and
continue to rise to near 18.2 feet by Sunday January 12.The river
will fall below flood stage by Monday January 13.
* At 18.0 feet...Water is flowing over Hood Road. The flood plain
between Town Creek and the Tombigbee River is flooded.  Extensive
agricultural flooding is occurring along Highway 6 near Bigbee.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
